title: Patch Notes
content: longer transfer the ball to Scratch after a Long Rest. Fixed a rare case where custom characters no longer followed the controlled player. Improved an edge-case quirk of AI spellcasting by ensuring that it has a source and target position before committing to a projectile-based attack. Prevented summons and followers like Glut from being able to consume Noblestalk. Yes, your Mage Hand probably ate it. No, we don't know where its mouth is. Dismissing hirelings or avatars via dialogue now function
